function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Imbalanced air distribution due to the positioning of fans and air-conditioners leading to stagnant air pockets.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimal arrangement of chairs and tables may not allow for sufficient social distance","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow circulation in the closed environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate space allocation for social distancing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective airflow within physical environments","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases in a crowded room with 35 people","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relaxing constraints on social distancing in interior spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of multiple algorithms for optimization","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Storage and display of output data","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation dependency on a specific software package matlab","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of algorithm not performing optimally in different environments","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential security risks associated with the use of specific algorithms and methods","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ambiguity in optimization problem formulation and implementation details","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of physical distancing requirements in room layout","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clarity in the visualization of the obtained solution","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimization problem for arranging chairs in a rectangular room","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Iterative solving of equations can lead to algorithmic errors and incorrect solutions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Trust region approximation may introduce inaccuracies in function behavior estimation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap of circles due to inadequate distance constraints","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective optimization of circle placement within the unit square","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of boundary constraints leading to improper circle placement","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap of circles leading to potential disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of accessibility for movement and flow of people","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overlap of circles in the two-dimensional space, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing parameters in physical spaces.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for disease transmission in crowded spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Complex mathematical modeling without real-world validation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Airflow patterns as a vector of virus risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission in building design and optimization","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited awareness of the requirements for social distancing and safety guidelines in physical space modeling","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Failure to adapt to the new normal of physical distancing in public and private spaces","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of close proximity leading to contagious disease spread in indoor environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contagion in close spatial arrangements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of diseases in industrial applications","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient airflow patterns leading to disease transmission","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proposing a constrained optimization problem for physical space design without considering all relevant factors and constraints.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on static design solutions that for disease tracking and analysis","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of computational solutions for social distancing enhanced optimal design of physical
